item.title: AFL reaches out to Hawks, admits Ginnivan frees were missed
item.description: The AFL admits the umpires missed some of the free kicks that should have been paid to Jack Ginnivan

item.title: Hawks' forward line cops double blow with key duo sidelined
item.description: Electric forward Nick Watson faces up to six weeks on the sidelines with an ankle injury, while Mitch Lewis has a hamstring strain

item.description: AFL executive general manager of football Laura Kane has explained why the Cats and Tom Hawkins have received a warning

item.title: Nicks accepts growing criticism as Crows dealt fresh injury blow
item.description: Matthew Nicks says he understands why there is growing criticism of the Crows

item.title: 'I'm worried': The biggest concern about West Coast's horror start
item.description: The Eagles are "getting worse" after a horror start to the 2024 season

item.title: 'It sucks': Rioli backs Tigers to thrive despite forward's injury
item.description: Richmond is looking to luckless Tom Lynch for more off-field inspiration after his latest injury

item.title: Coaches' votes, R3: Big Blue makes a move, Swan still leads
item.description: The coaches' votes are in for the round three games

item.title: Power mid edges closer to return, 'valuable lessons' learned from loss
item.description: Jason Horne-Francis trained strongly as he pushes to return from a hamstring injury in time for Port Adelaide's clash with Essendon on Friday night

item.title: Jack of all trades: Where Sun fits in Gold Coast's jigsaw
item.description: After being moved back to defence for the Suns, Jack Lukosius has discussed where he sees himself playing in the coming weeks

item.title: Pressure point: Ruthless Tigers dial up heat in maiden win
item.description: After a lacklustre showing in round two, Richmond lifted its pressure rating and registered nearly twice as many tackles in its round three clash with Sydney

item.title: Tigers head to Tribunal, Saints accept Windhager's ban
item.description: The Tigers are challenging Liam Baker's suspension at the Tribunal
